DOC.criteria: Age > 18 year age Written inform consent obtain Patients castrationresistant prostate cancer initiate SipuleucelT standard therapy No prior systemic chemotherapy metastatic prostate cancer Hemoglobin > 9 mg/dl Patients unable understand research protocol and/or provide inform consent
